data.SOURCE:
@AccessControl.authorizationCheck: #NOT_REQUIRED
@EndUserText.label: 'Dosya Kapama Verileri'
define root view entity ZI_NFT_DDL_IMPORT_CLEAR_BLNC_H
  as select distinct from znft_t_r002        as r002
    inner join            I_DeliveryDocument as delivery on delivery.DeliveryDocument = r002.deliverydocument
    inner join            znft_t_dlv_cus     as dlv_cus  on dlv_cus.deliverydocument = r002.deliverydocument
    left outer join       I_Supplier                     on I_Supplier.Supplier = delivery.Supplier
    left outer join DDCDS_CUSTOMER_DOMAIN_VALUE_T( p_domain_name: 'ZNFT_D_DDTYP' ) as ddtyp_tx on ddtyp_tx.value_low = dlv_cus.documenttype
                                                                                              and ddtyp_tx.language = $session.system_language
  composition [0..*] of ZI_NFT_DDL_IMPORT_CLEAR_BLNC_I as _item
{
  key delivery.DeliveryDocument,
      delivery.Supplier,
      I_Supplier.SupplierName,
      delivery.CreationDate,
      dlv_cus.documenttype,
      ddtyp_tx.text as DocumentTypeText,
      _item
}
